title: Ruby Dome
text: Ruby Dome is the highest <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in both the <a href="Ruby%20Mountains">Ruby Mountains</a> and <a href="Elko%20County%2C%20Nevada">Elko County</a>, in <a href="Nevada">Nevada</a>, United States. It is the twenty-seventh-highest mountain in the state, and also ranks as the thirteenth-most <a href="topographic%20prominence">topographically prominent</a> peak in the state. The peak is located about southeast of the city of <a href="Elko%2C%20Nevada">Elko</a> within the Ruby Mountains Ranger District of the <a href="Humboldt-Toiyabe%20National%20Forest">Humboldt-Toiyabe National Forest</a>. The mountain rises from a base elevation of about to a height of . It is the highest mountain for over 90 miles in all directions.
